parse.title: List of historical fiction by time period

text.*:
This list of historical fiction is designed to provide examples of notable historical works divided by time period.

For a more exhaustive list of historical novels by period, see Category:Historical novels by setting, which lists relevant Wikipedia categories; also see the larger List of historical novels, which is organized by country, as well as the more general Category:Historical novels and Category:Historical fiction.

Contents

  • 1 Novels
    • 1.1 Set in Prehistory (c. 30,000 BC – 3000 BC)
    • 1.2 Set in Classical Greece, Ancient Egypt, the Roman Empire, etc. (c. 2000 BC – 500 AD)
    • 1.3 Set in the Middle Ages (c. 500 AD – 1500)
    • 1.4 Set in the Early Modern Period (c. 1500 – 1760)
    • 1.5 Set during the Industrial Revolution and Napoleonic Era (c. 1760 – 1840)
    • 1.6 Set during recent history (c. 1850 – 1950)
  • 2 Theatre
    • 2.1 Set 2000 BC – 600 AD
    • 2.2 Set 600 AD – 1550
    • 2.3 Set after 1550
  • 3 Opera
    • 3.1 Set 3000 BC – 600 AD
    • 3.2 Set 600 AD – 1800
  • 4 Films and television
  • 5 Poetry
  • 6 Comics
    • 6.1 Prehistoric
    • 6.2 Ancient
    • 6.3 Wuxia manhua
    • 6.4 Samurai manga
  • 7 See also
  • 8 External links

Novels[edit]

Set in Prehistory (c. 30,000 BC – 3000 BC)[edit]

  • Earth's Children by Jean Auel
  • Ember of a New World by Tom Watson
  • Stonehenge by Bernard Cornwell
  • Pillar of the Sky by Cecelia Holland
  • Mammoth Trilogy by Stephen Baxter
  • The Gathering Night by Margaret Elphinstone
  • Song of the Axe and Song of the Earth by John R. Dann
  • Chronicles of Ancient Darkness by Michelle Paver
  • First North Americans by W. Michael Gear & Kathleen O'Neal Gear
  • The Temporary Zare (На заре времен) series by Semyon Karatov et al.
  • The King Must Die and The Bull from the Sea by Mary Renault
  • The Inheritors by William Golding
  • The Quest for Fire by J.-H. Rosny

  • Fire from Heaven, The Persian Boy, and Funeral Games by Mary Renault
  • Emperor series by Conn Iggulden

  • Men of Bronze and Memnon by Scott Oden
  • The Scourge of God by William Dietrich
  • Pharaoh by Bolesław Prus
  • Julian and Creation by Gore Vidal
  • The Sword of Attila (Мечът на Атила) by Petar Bobev

  • Uard, Homo Sum, Die Schwester, Der Kaiser by Georg Ebers
  • Carthage Trilogy by Ross Leckie
  • Kleopatra Pharaoh by Karen Essex
  • Gaius Valerius Verrens series by Douglas Jackson
  • The Ramses Series and The Queen of Freedom Trilogy by Christian Jacq
  • The Empress of Silk (L'impératrice de la soie) and The Jade Disc (Le disque de jade) by José Frèches

  • Marcus Corvinus series by David Wishart
  • Roma Sub Rosa by Steven Saylor
  • The Memoirs of Cleopatra by Margaret George

  • Vespasian series by Robert Fabbri
  • Cicero Trilogy (Imperium/Lustrum/Dictator) and Pompeii by Robert Harris
  • The Egyptian and The Secret of the Kingdom by Mika Waltari
  • The Alexander Trilogy (Trilogia di Aléxandros) by Valerio Massimo Manfredi
  • Eagle Series and Gladiator Series by Simon Scarrow
  • Quo Vadis: A Narrative of the Time of Nero by Henryk Sienkiewicz
  • Lion of Sparta (Леонид. Спартанский лев) and Darius (Дарий) by Viktor Porotnikov
  • Troy Series by David Gemmel
  • The Walled Orchard, Olympiad, Song for Nero, Meadowland and Alexander: At World's End by Tom Holt
  • Judge Dee by Robert Van Gulik
  • Romance of the Three Kingdoms by Luo Guanzhong and retold by Eiji Yoshikawa
  • Gates of Fire, Last of the Amazons, The Virtues of War, The Afghan Campaign and Tides of War by Stephen Pressfield
  • Hay luz en casa de Publio Fama by Juan Miñana
  • Scipio trilogy and Trajan trilogy by Santiago Posteguillo
  • El lazo de púrpura by Alejandro Núñez Alonso
  • The Unconquered Sun by Ralph Dulin
  • Helena by Evelyn Waugh
  • Christ the Lord: Out of Egypt and Christ the Lord: The Road to Cana by Anne Rice
  • Ben-Hur: A Tale of the Christ by Lew Wallace
  • The Robe by Lloyd C. Douglas
  • The Last Temptation of Christ by Nikos Kazantzakis
  • The Gospel According to the Son by Norman Mailer
  • The Source by James A. Michener
  • Raptor by Gary Jennings
  • The Red Tent by Anita Diamant
  • The Masters of Rome series by Colleen McCullough
  • The Ides of March by Thornton Wilder
  • Death Comes as the End by Agatha Christie
  • Salammbô by Gustave Flaubert

Set in the Middle Ages (c. 500 AD – 1500)[edit]

See also: Arthurian fiction
  • Les Rois maudits (The Accursed Kings) by Maurice Druon
  • The Saxon Stories and The Grail Quest by Bernard Cornwell
  • The Conquest Trilogy and Passing Under Heaven by Justin Hill
  • Conqueror series by Conn Iggulden
  • Oathsworn Series by Robert Low
  • Matthew Bartholomew series by Susanna Gregory
  • Brethren Trilogy and The Insurrection Trilogy by Robyn Young
  • Camulod Chronicles by Jack Whyte
  • Kings of Albion and The Last English King by Julian Rathbone
  • Minstrel Dick. A Tale of the XIVth Century by Christabel R. Coleridge (set in the court of Edward, the Black Prince)
  • King Raven Trilogy by Stephen Lawhead
  • The Knights of the Cross by Henryk Sienkiewicz
  • New Tale of the Heike by Eiji Yoshikawa
  • The Viking Series and Saxon by Tim Severin
  • Nama miko monogatari (A Tale of False Fortunes) by Fumiko Enchi
  • The Plantagenet Series, The Welsh Princes Series, The Sunne in Splendour by Sharon Kay Penman
  • The Cadfael Chronicles and A Bloody Field by Shrewsbury by Edith Pargeter
  • The Corban Loosestrife series and Great Maria by Cecelia Holland
  • El Doncel de don Enrique el Doliente by Mariano José de Larra
  • Sancho Saldaña o el castellano de Cuellar by José de Espronceda
  • Svetoslav Terter, Two against hell and Black Rider by Tsoncho Rodev
  • Il cavaliere invisibile by Valerio Massimo Manfredi
  • Telling of Khan Asparoukh, knyaz Slav and votari Terez, Telling of the time of Samuil, Odd knight of Holy book by Anton Donchev
  • Los bandos de Castilla by Ramón López Soler
  • Los malos años and Corazón oscuro by León Arsenal
  • El camino mozarabe by Jesús Sánchez Adalid
  • Pre-Aztec Series, The Rise of the Aztecs Series, The Peacemaker Series, The People of the Longhouse Series by Zoe Saadia
  • The Walking Drum by Louis L'Amour
  • The Name of the Rose by Umberto Eco
  • Ivanhoe by Sir Walter Scott
  • The Pillars of the Earth and World Without End by Ken Follett
  • Poland by James A. Michener
  • The Journeyer by Gary Jennings
  • The Long Ships by Frans G. Bengtsson

Set in the Early Modern Period (c. 1500 – 1760)[edit]

  • Sano Ichiro by Laura Joh Rowland
  • Lymond Chronicles and The House of Niccolò by Dorothy Dunnett
  • The Secrets of the Tudor Court and Face Down Mysteries by Kate Emerson
  • Captain Alatriste by Arturo Pérez-Reverte
  • Peter I by Aleksey Nikolayevich Tolstoy
  • The White Devil (Белият Дявол) by Hristo Kalchev
  • The Waverley Novels by Walter Scott
  • The Cem Case (Случаят Джем) by Vera Mutafchieva
  • My Name is Red and The White Castle by Orhan Pamuk
  • Mathias Tannhauser trilogy by Tim Willocks
  • d'Artagnan Romances and Valois Romances by Alexandre Dumas
  • Leonardo's Swans by Karen Essex
  • Miyamoto Musashi and Taiko ki by Eiji Yoshikawa
  • Imprimatur Secretum Veritas Mysterium... by Rita Monaldi and Francesco Sorti
  • Leo Africanus, Samarkand, Balthasar's Odyssey by Amin Maalouf
  • Shōgun by James Clavell
  • Adventures of Captain Alatriste series by Arturo Pérez-Reverte
  • The Heretic: A Novel of the Inquisition by Miguel Delibes
  • Ladrones de tinta by Alfonso Mateo-Sagasta
  • El reino de los hombres sin amor by Alfonso Mateo-Sagasta
  • The Heart of Jade (El Corazón de piedra verde) by Salvador de Madariaga
  • La aventura equinocial de Lope de Aguirre by Ramón José Sender Garcés
  • Tlaloc Weeps for Mexico (Esőisten siratja Mexikót) by László Passuth
  • Centauros by Alberto Vázquez-Figueroa (Alonso de Ojeda)
  • The Last Crusader by Louis de Wohl
  • Aztec by Gary Jennings
  • Romola by George Eliot
  • Wolf Hall and Bring Up the Bodies by Hilary Mantel
  • Seek the Fair Land by Walter Macken
  • The Leatherstocking Tales by James Fenimore Cooper
  • The Scarlet Letter by Nathaniel Hawthorne
  • Silence by Shūsaku Endō
  • Hawaii, Chesapeake and Caribbean by James A. Michener
  • The Orenda by Joseph Boyden
  • The Accursed Kings series by Maurice Druon
  • Girl with a Pearl Earring by Tracy Chevalier
  • Pirate Latitudes by Michael Crichton

Set during the Industrial Revolution and Napoleonic Era (c. 1760 – 1840)[edit]

  • Money Power Love by Joss Sheldon
  • Sharpe series by Bernard Cornwell
  • The Competition by Caroline Miley
  • Aubrey-Maturin series by Patrick O'Brian
  • Hornblower series by C.S. Forester
  • Lord Ramage by Dudley Pope
  • Saint Hermine Series by Alexandre Dumas
  • The Trilogy by Henryk Sienkiewicz
  • Ethan Cage by William Dietrich
  • The Mutiny by Julian Rathbone
  • Stealing Athena by Karen Essex
  • The Revolution Quartet by Simon Scarrow
  • Beltrán Ochoa, capitán de Dragones series by Octavio Sánchez-Machuca (Carlos III reign)
  • El día que España derrotó a Inglaterra. De cómo Blas de Lezo, tuerto, manco y cojo, venció en Cartagena de Indias a la otra «Armada Invencible» by Pablo Victoria
  • National Episodes by Benito Pérez Galdós)
  • La Regenta by Leopoldo Alas (Clarín)
  • Fortunata y Jacinta by Benito Pérez Galdós
  • Un día de cólera, El húsar, The Siege (El asedio) and La sombra del águila by Arturo Pérez-Reverte
  • Una saga marinera española by Luis Delgado Bañón
  • Historical romances by Eleanor Hibbert
  • A Tale of Two Cities by Charles Dickens
  • War and Peace by Leo Tolstoy
  • The Berrybender Narratives by Larry McMurtry
  • The Kent Family Chronicles by John Jakes
  • Narratives of America series by Allan W. Eckert
  • The Fort by Bernard Cornwell
  • The Revenant by Michael Punke
  • The Awakening Land trilogy by Conrad Richter
  • Johnny Tremain by Esther Forbes
  • Burr by Gore Vidal
  • Poldark series by Winston Graham
  • A Place Called Freedom by Ken Follett
  • Alaska by James A. Michener
  • The Confessions of Nat Turner by William Styron
  • Drums Along the Mohawk by Walter D. Edmonds
  • Roots: The Saga of an American Family by Alex Haley
  • April Morning by Howard Fast
  • The Book of Negroes by Lawrence Hill
  • The Sergeant Lamb novels by Robert Graves
  • The Revolution at Sea saga by James L. Nelson
  • Mason & Dixon by Thomas Pynchon
  • The Playmaker by Thomas Keneally
  • The Bolitho novels by Alexander Kent

Main pages: Category:American Civil War novels, Category:Western (genre) novels, Category:World War I novels, and Category:World War II novels
  • The Starbuck Chronicles by Bernard Cornwell
  • The Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse by Vicente Blasco Ibáñez
  • Enigma by Robert Harris
  • Cézanne’s Quarry by Barbara Corrado Pope
  • The Blood of Lorraine by Barbara Corrado Pope
  • The Missing Italian Girl by Barbara Corrado Pope
  • Lonesome Dove series by Larry McMurtry
  • The Sackett series by Louis L'Amour
  • North and South trilogy by John Jakes
  • The Killer Angels by Michael Shaara
  • Shiloh by Shelby Foote
  • Little House on the Prairie series by Laura Ingalls Wilder
  • The Winds of War and War and Remembrance by Herman Wouk
  • Narratives of Empire series by Gore Vidal
  • The novels of E. L. Doctorow
  • Fall of Giants, Winter of the World and Edge of Eternity by Ken Follett
  • Centennial, The Covenant, Texas, and Journey by James A. Michener
  • Tai-Pan and Gai-Jin by James Clavell
  • The Great Train Robbery by Michael Crichton
  • The Kreizler series by Caleb Carr
  • The L.A. Quartet and the Underworld USA Trilogy by James Ellroy
  • The James Reasoner Civil War Series by James Reasoner
  • Beloved by Toni Morrison
  • The Emigrants series by Vilhelm Moberg
  • The Road to Wellville by T.C. Boyle
  • Schindler's Ark by Thomas Keneally
  • The Thorn Birds by Colleen McCullough
  • Gone with the Wind by Margaret Mitchell
  • Exodus by Leon Uris
  • The Prague Cemetery by Umberto Eco
  • Drood by Dan Simmons
  • The Flashman Papers series by George MacDonald Fraser

Theatre[edit]

Set 2000 BC – 600 AD[edit]

  • Antony and Cleopatra, Julius Caesar, Timon of Athens, Titus Andronicus by William Shakespeare
  • Britannicus by Jean Racine
  • Caligula by Albert Camus
  • The Death of Pompey by Pierre Corneille
  • Socrates on Trial by Andrew David Irvine
  • Caesar and Cleopatra by George Bernard Shaw
  • The Siege of Numantia by Miguel de Cervantes
  • Salome by Oscar Wilde

Set 600 AD – 1550[edit]

  • St Joan by George Bernard Shaw
  • William Shakespeare's English history plays
  • Edward II, Tamburlaine, and The Massacre at Paris by Christopher Marlowe
  • Henry IV by Luigi Pirandello
  • In Extremis: The Story of Abelard & Heloise and Anne Boleyn by Howard Brenton
  • The Jester's Supper by Sem Benelli
  • Marie Tudor by Victor Hugo
  • Götz von Berlichingen by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
  • Murder in the Cathedral by T. S. Eliot

Set after 1550[edit]

  • Egmont and Torquato Tasso by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
  • Mary Stuart and Demetrius by Friedrich Schiller
  • Cross and Sword by Paul Green

Opera[edit]

Main articles: List of historical opera characters and Category:Historical operas

Set 3000 BC – 600 AD[edit]

  • Aida and Nabucco by Giuseppe Verdi
  • Akhnaten by Philip Glass
  • Cléopâtre and Hérodiade by Jules Massenet
  • Mosè in Egitto by Gioachino Rossini
  • Giulio Cesare by George Frideric Handel
  • Les Troyens by Hector Berlioz
  • Sapho by Charles Gounod
  • L'Olimpiade by Metastasio
  • Germanicus by Georg Philipp Telemann

Set 600 AD – 1800[edit]

  • Gustave III by Daniel Auber
  • Henry VIII by Camille Saint-Saëns
  • William Tell by Gioachino Rossini
  • Les Huguenots and Le prophète by Giacomo Meyerbeer
  • Fosca and Salvator Rosa by Antônio Carlos Gomes
  • Fernand Cortez by Gaspare Spontini
  • Thérèse by Jules Massenet
  • Le roi l'a dit by Léo Delibes
  • Tamerlano and Rodelinda by George Frideric Handel
  • Les Abencérages by Luigi Cherubini
  • Montezuma by Roger Sessions
  • Macbeth by Giuseppe Verdi

Films and television[edit]

Main articles: list of historical period drama films, Category:Historical television series, and Category:Historical films

Poetry[edit]

  • The Light of Asia by Sir Edwin Arnold: life of Gautama Buddha, 6th or 5th century BC
  • The Rape of Lucrece by William Shakespeare: reign of Lucius Tarquinius Superbus in Rome, 6th century BC
  • Horatius by Thomas Babington Macaulay: Horatius Cocles vs Lars Porsena, Rome, 6th century BC
  • Roderick the Last of the Goths by Robert Southey: reign of Roderic, 8th century Hispania
  • King Alfred by John Fitchett: reign of Alfred the Great, 9th century England
  • The Ballad of the White Horse by G. K. Chesterton: reign of Alfred the Great, 9th century England
  • The Saga of King Olaf by Henry Wadsworth Longfellow: reign of Olaf Tryggvason, 10th century Norway
  • Madoc by Robert Southey: legend of Madoc, 12th century Wales
  • Isabella, or the Pot of Basil and The Eve of St. Agnes by John Keats: European Middle Ages
  • Marmion by Sir Walter Scott: reign of Henry VIII of England & the Battle of Flodden, 1513
  • The Revenge: A Ballad of the Fleet by Alfred, Lord Tennyson: Battle of Flores, 1591
  • Bonnie Dundee by Sir Walter Scott: Viscount Dundee and the Jacobite rising of 1689
  • Evangeline by Henry Wadsworth Longfellow: the Expulsion of the Acadians (1755–1764)
  • Paul Revere's Ride by Henry Wadsworth Longfellow: American Revolutionary War (1775)

Comics[edit]

Main page: Category:Historical comics

Prehistoric[edit]

  • Rahan by Roger Lecureux and Jean-François Lecureux
  • Akim by Roberto Renzi

Ancient[edit]

  • 300 by Frank Miller
  • Age of Bronze by Eric Shanower

Wuxia manhua[edit]

Main page: Category:Wuxia comics
  • Three Kingdoms by Yū Terashima
  • Fung Wan by Ma Wing-shing
  • Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon by Andy Seto
  • The Ravages of Time by Chan Mou
  • Threads of Time by Noh Mi-young
  • Ying Xiong Wu Lei by Ma Wing Shing

Samurai manga[edit]

Main page: Category:Samurai in anime and manga
  • Rurouni Kenshin by Nobuhiro Watsuki
  • Azumi by Yū Koyama
  • Path of the Assassin by Kazuo Koike
